answers.answer: Diabetes, which you have, will cause that bad stinging sensation you have, and so too will high blood pressure!  I think perhaps if you visited your doc again and have your sugars and BP tested, could be he will want to adjust your medicines.
Have you had any basic labs drawn recently?What meds are taking?
I haven't had any diabetes. But thank you that could be a possibility now.  I will mention that to my doctor.  Thank you again
TINA, I answered the post at the top, by a Mike Yarboro, and he said he was diabetic and had high blood pressure.  Perhaps you posted elsewhere and mistakenly answered in here.

question: HELP  I have been feeling like im being stung by hundred's of bee's all over my body and face and have numbness under my left arm and at time's hand's I'm a diabetic and have high blood pressur and it seem's to be getting worse in the last week
title: Feeling of being stung by hundred's of bee's
